en-EN.article: Iâ€™m GÃ¶kcan. Thank you for visiting my profile. I am a former engineer and a recent graduate developer who is on a journey to develop my career in Front-End development.
en-EN.communication: You can contact me through my profiles above

info.name: Education
info.value: EskiÅŸehir Technical University, Mechanical Engineering (%30 English), Bachelor's, 2022

en-EN.about: After working in various fields of mechanical engineering, I decided to develop my career in design, computers, and web design, which I have been passionate about since childhood. The colorful world, the ability to see the real-time development of your work, and the infinite creativity it allows led me to Front-End development. I create user-focused and interactive web applications using modern technologies such as React, Redux, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript.
en-EN.about2: During my university years, I served as the Design Department Director in the EskiÅŸehir Technical University Career and Entrepreneurship Student Community, creating designs (posters, banners, videos) and event content. I also participated in social responsibility projects by introducing Turkish language and culture to international volunteers at AIESEC Turkey. Additionally, I developed content creation and organizational skills at the Social Media Student Community. My social activities include cooking, watching documentaries, practicing martial arts, and organizing trips outside the city.

Pizza.name: Pizza Order Website
Pizza.description: A dynamic order page created for a pizza company. It is built with React and Axios to handle POST requests. It is a single-page application consisting of 3 components. Form validation checks the input before posting the data.
